mapper.select: SELECT IF(RST.COMPLETE_YN = 'N', '예약중', NULL) AS POSSIBLE , VHC.VHC_ID AS VHC_ID , VHC.VHC_NO AS VHC_NO , DL.DL_CD_NM AS VHC_KIND_NM , DL2.DL_CD_NM AS INST_LOC_NM , DVC.MNG_ID AS MNG_ID FROM BM_VHC_INFO VHC LEFT JOIN BM_DVC_INFO DVC ON VHC.VHC_ID = DVC.VHC_ID LEFT JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL ON DVC.DVC_KIND = DL.DL_CD AND DL.CO_CD = 'DVC_KIND' LEFT JOIN SM_DL_CD_INFO DL2 ON DVC.INST_LOC = DL2.DL_CD AND DL2.CO_CD = 'INST_LOC' LEFT JOIN BM_VDO_RSV_RST RST ON DVC.MNG_ID = RST.MNG_ID AND COMPLETE_YN = 'N' WHERE VHC.USE_YN = 'Y' AND DVC.USE_YN = 'Y' AND DL.TXT_VAL1 = 'PD' ORDER BY VHC.VHC_ID, DVC.MNG_ID

SELECT IF(FILE_TYPE = 'AV001', 'V', 'I') AS VIDEO_TYPE , IF(FILE_TYPE = 'AV001', CONCAT(VINFO.VDO_ID, '.mp4'), CONCAT(VINFO.VDO_ID, '.jpg')) AS VIDEO_FILE , DATE_FORMAT(PLAY_ST_DATE, '%Y%m%d') AS PLAY_ST_DATE , DATE_FORMAT(PLAY_ED_DATE, '%Y%m%d') AS PLAY_ED_DATE , IMG_PLAY_TM AS RUN_TIME FROM BM_VDO_ORGA_LIST OLIST LEFT JOIN BM_VDO_INFO VINFO ON OLIST.VDO_ID = VINFO.VDO_ID WHERE ORGA_ID = #{value} ORDER BY SEQ
